actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committees.committee: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

official_title: A bill to amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to prohibit graduate medical schools from receiving Federal financial assistance if such schools adopt certain policies and requirements relating to diversity, equity, and inclusion.
short_title: Embracing Anti-Discrimination, Unbiased Curricula, and Advancing Truth in Education Act

titles.title: Embracing Anti-Discrimination, Unbiased Curricula, and Advancing Truth in Education Act
Embracing Anti-Discrimination, Unbiased Curricula, and Advancing Truth in Education Act

A bill to amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to prohibit graduate medical schools from receiving Federal financial assistance if such schools adopt certain policies and requirements relating to diversity, equity, and inclusion.
